Name: Bar Mace
Mastery:
When you wield a Bar Mace it gains the ~wp^Deflect~# property.

If you roll 5 over the AC of an enemy, it gains disadvantage on melee attacks until the end of its next turn.

Name: Bo Staff
Mastery:
When you wield a Bo staff it gains the ~wp^Lunge~# Property.

If you have the Extra Attack feature and you are only wielding a single Bo Staff, this weapon's ~wp^Double~# property benefits from extra attack when you use it, as well as on opportunity attacks.

Name: Dagger
Mastery: You can use a bonus action to make an attack with a dagger, even if you don't take the attack action.

Name: Flanged Mace
Mastery:
Flanged maces do 2d4 damage for you.

If you roll 5 over the AC of an enemy , you reduce their AC by 2 until it finishes a short or long rest.
A creature may only be subject to this effect once.

Name: Gauntlet
Mastery: Gauntlets gain the ~wp^~wp^Light~#~# property for you.When you are hit with a melee attack, as a reaction before the damage, you can attempt a Disarm attack.If you disarm the enemy, you take no damage and come into possession of the weapon.

Name: Greatclub
Mastery: You deal 1d10 damage with a greatclub and it gains the Deflect property.If you are successful in a disarm attempt, the enemy subtracts 1d4 for all damage rolls with that weapon until they take a short or long rest to repair it.

Name: Handaxe
Mastery: Handaxes gain the Disarm property for you. You have advantage on Disarm attacks.

Name: Heavy Club
Mastery: Heavy clubs deal 1d8 damage.If you roll 5 over the target´s AC, your enemy has disadvantage to all attacks and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Name: Interceptor
Mastery: Your Deflect can be used against ranged weapon attacks for 1d8.When a creature you can see attacks a target within 5 ft of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage.

Name: Javelin
Mastery: Javelins deal 1d8 damage for you and gain the ~wp^Light~# property.If you score 5 over the enemy´s AC, the target suffers a -2 AC penalty.On its turn an enemy can use an action to succeed on a Strength check to pry the javelin free, destroying it in the process.

Name: Kama
Mastery: You deal 1d6 damage with a Kama and it gains the ~wp^Entangle~# property.If you score a critical hit with a kama, add an additional dice to the damage.If you are wielding two kamas, you may add two dice instead.

Name: Kunai
Mastery: Kunai deal 1d6 damage for you.If you hit an enemy with a kunai, you impose disadvantage on its next saving throw against a spell or magical effect until the end of its next turn.

Name: ~wp^Light~# Club
Mastery: ~wp^Light~# clubs deal 1d6 damage for you.If you score 5 over the enemy's AC on your attack, it gains disadvantage on its next strength, dexterity or wisdom saving throw before the end of his next turn.

Name: Light Flail
Mastery: Light flails gain the Light property for you.If you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your Weapon DC or be knocked prone.

Name: Light Hammer
Mastery: Light hammers deal 1d6 damage for you.You can attempt a shove as a bonus action.Any successful shove attempt also deals damage equal to your strength modifier.

Name: Light Pick
Mastery: You may attempt a shove as a bonus action.Any successful shove attempt also deals damage equal to your strength modifier.

Name: Mancatcher
Mastery: You may attempt a shove as a bonus action.Any successful shove attempt also deals damage equal to your strength modifier.

Name: Morningstar
Mastery: Morningstars deal 1d10 damage for you and gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property.If you roll 5 over the AC of an enemy, it gains disadvantage on melee attacks until the end of its next turn.

Name: Net
Mastery: Nets do not impose disadvantage when throwing beyond its normal range.Once per turn, when a creature is entangled by your net, you can choose to make an attack roll against its AC.If you succeed, it takes damage equal to half its remaining hit points as it had taken from the attack.This speed reduction does not stack.

Name: Quarterstaff
Mastery: You can use a bonus action to strike with the opposite end of the staff, dealing 1d4 bludgeoning damage plus your Strength or Dexterity modifier.

Name: Sickle
Mastery: You can use a bonus action to make an attack with a sickle, even if you don't take the attack action.

Name: Sling
Mastery: When you fire a sling, you may opt to stun your enemy.If you do so, the damage is reduced to 1d4 and the enemy must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.If you have advantage and both rolls would have hit, your enemy has disadvantage on the saving throw.

Name: Spear
Mastery: Spears gain the ~wp^Brace~# property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Name: Side Baton
Mastery: Side Batons gain the ~wp^Light~# property for you.You can use a bonus action to make an attack with a side baton, even if you don't take the attack action.

Name: Throwing knife
Mastery: Throwing Knives gain the ~wp^Conceal~# property for you.You can use a bonus action to make an attack with a throwing knife, even if you don't take the attack action.

Name: Warhammer
Mastery: Warhammers gain the Disarm property for you.If you hit an enemy wearing medium or heavy armor, you can choose to reduce the enemy's AC by 1 until the enemy takes a short or long rest to repair it.A creature can be affected by this effect only once.

Name: Bastard Sword
Mastery: Bastard Swords gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy takes an additional 1d6 slashing damage per one handed attack, or 1d10 per two handed attack.

Name: Battleaxe
Mastery: Battleaxes gain the Disarm property for you.You have advantage on Disarm attacks.

Name: Bec De Corbin
Mastery: Bec De Corbin deal 1d12 damage for you and gain the ~wp^Brace~# property.If you hit an enemy wearing medium or heavy armor, you can choose to reduce the enemy's AC by 2 until the enemy takes a short or long rest to repair it.A creature can be affected by this effect only once.

Name: Broadaxe
Mastery: Broadaxes gain the Disarm property for you. You have advantage on Disarm attacks.

Name: Chain Whip
Mastery: Chain whips deal 1d6 damage for you and gain the Disarm property.If you are successful in a disarm attack, the enemy cannot draw a new weapon until the end of its next turn.

Name: Light Crossbow
Mastery: Crossbows gain the ~wp^Versatile~# property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your Weapon DC or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

Name: Falchion
Mastery: Falchions gain the ~wp^Finesse~# property for you.If you roll 5 over the AC of an enemy that can bleed , it takes the weapon's damage at the start of every one of their turns until it succeeds on a Constitution Saving Throw against your Weapon DC at the end of their turn, receive healing or aid from a healer's kit.

Name: Flail
Mastery: Flails deal 1d10 damage for you and gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property.If you are successful in a Disarm attempt, the enemy subtracts 1d4 for all damage rolls with that weapon until they take a short or long rest to repair it.

Name: Glaive
Mastery: Glaives gain the ~wp^Trip~# property for you.When a creature enters the reach of your weapon, you can use your reaction to make a single melee attack against that creature.The attack must be a normal weapon attack, and cannot be a property attack forcing another saving throw.

Name: Greatsword
Mastery: Greatswords gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy is knocked prone.

Name: Guisarme
Mastery: You deal 1d12 damage with a guisarme.You have advantage on trip attacks made to targets not adjacent to you.If you hit a mounted foe with a trip attack, it is dismounted and knocked prone.

Name: Halberd
Mastery: Halberds gain the ~wp^Trip~# property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your Weapon DC or be knocked prone.

Name: Hand-and-a-half Sword
Mastery: Hand-and-a-half Swords gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make a Disarm attack against that enemy.The damage from the enemy's attack resolves before the enemy is disarmed.

Name: Hidden Blade
Special: The hand this weapon is in can still hold a component or shield and also use the hidden blade from the same hand.This weapon cannot be disarmed but takes an action to equip or remove.
Mastery: Any hit against a surprised creature takes maximum dice rolls from this weapon and any modifiers, instead of rolling for the damage

Name: Katana
Mastery: Katanas gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.Once per turn when you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points with an attack with this weapon, you can choose to make another weapon attack.

Name: Lance
Special: You have disadvantage when you use a lance to attack a target within 5 ft of you.While mounted, this disadvantage is removed and you gain advantage instead.
Mastery: You deal 2d6 damage with a lance.When you hit an enemy while mounted, you deal an additional 1d6 damage.If the enemy is a mounted creature, you deal an additional 1d12 instead.

Name: Longsword
Mastery: Longswords gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.When a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make a Disarm attack against that enemy.

Name: Maul
Mastery: Mauls gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.If you hit an enemy wearing medium or heavy armor, you can choose to reduce the enemy's AC by 2 until the enemy takes a short or long rest to repair it.A creature can be affected by this effect only once.

Name: Naginata
Mastery: Naginatas gain the ~wp^Trip~# property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your Weapon DC or be knocked prone.

Name: Partisan
Mastery: Partisans gain the Disarm property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your Weapon DC or be knocked prone.

Name: Pike
Mastery: Pikes gain the Disarm property for you.When a creature enters the reach of your weapon, you can use your reaction to make a single melee attack against that creature.The attack must be a normal weapon attack, and cannot be a property attack forcing another saving throw.

Name: Rapier
Mastery: Rapiers gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.Once per turn, when a creature misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to make a Disarm attack against that enemy.

Name: Rondel Dagger
Mastery: Rondel daggers deal 1d6 damage for you and gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property.If you roll 5 over the AC of an enemy wearing medium or heavy armor, you can choose to reduce the enemy's AC by 2 until the enemy takes a short or long rest to repair it.A creature can be affected by this effect only once.

Name: Scimitar
Mastery: Scimitars gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.You can use a bonus action to make an attack with a scimitar, even if you don't take the attack action.

Name: Short Glaive
Mastery: When a creature misses you with an attack, it provokes an opportunity attack from you.If you move at least 20 feet in a straight line and use the attack action at the end of it, you may do one extra attack with a short glaive.

Name: Shortsword
Mastery: Shortswords gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.You can use a bonus action to make an attack with a shortsword, even if you don't take the attack action.

Name: Tanto
Mastery: Tantos gain the ~wp^Deflect~# and ~wp^Versatile~# properties for you.If you are attacked or disarmed from your weapon, you may freely draw it from its scabbard beforehand.

Name: Trident
Mastery: Tridents gain the ~wp^Trip~# property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your Weapon DC or be knocked prone.

Name: Two-Bladed Scimitar
Mastery: Two-bladed scimitars gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.If you hit an enemy with the first attack, you have advantage on the second attack, and vice versa.

Name: War Pick
Mastery: War picks deal 1d10 damage for you and gain the Versatile property.If you move at least 10ft in a straight line before your attack, a successful hit on an enemy wearing medium or heavy armor will reduce the enemy´s AC by 2 if it is one handed, or 3 if it is a two handed attack until it is mended.A creature can be affected by this effect only once.

Name: War Fan
Mastery: While unfolded, your ~wp^Deflect~# can be used against ranged attacks with ~wp^Deflect~# 2d4.While folded, your war fan deals 2d4 damage

Name: Wakizashi
Mastery: Wakizashi gain the ~wp^Deflect~# property for you.You can use a bonus action to make an attack with a wakizashi, even if you don't take the attack action.

Name: Bladed Bow
Mastery: Bladed Bows deal 1d8 damage for you.When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of the turn, whether you hit or not.

Name: Blowgun
Mastery: Blowguns lose the Loading property for you.When you hit an enemy with a blowgun, the enemy must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

Name: Compound Bow
Mastery: Compound bows do not have the Loading property for you.When you overdraw, you take the normal -5 to attack, but if you hit, you triple your weapon damage (1d10+dex) instead of adding +10.

Name: Crossbow, Heavy
Mastery: Heavy Crossbows gain the ~wp^Versatile~# property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your Weapon DC or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

Name: Crossbow, Hand
Mastery: Hand Crossbows lose the Loading property for you.When you use your bonus action to make an attack with a hand crossbow, you can make two instead.

Name: Greatbow
Mastery: Greatbows lose the Loading property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed back 10 ft.

Name: Jemez Bow
Mastery: Jemez bows deal 1d10 damage for you and gain the ~wp^Versatile~# property.If you hit an enemy that is within 30 ft of you, you deal an additional 1d6 damage.

Name: Longbow
Mastery: Longbows lose the Loading property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your Weapon DC or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

Name: Orc Throwing Shot
Mastery: Orc throwing shot loses the Two-handed property for you , gains the ~wp^Versatile~# property and deals 1d12 damage.If you score a critical hit or have advantage and both rolls would have hit, your enemy must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.If you have disadvantage but one dice would have hit, deal your Strength modifier in damage, though this still counts as a miss.

Name: Sling Staff
Special: You may use this weapon as a melee weapon with the Two Handed, ~wp^Entangle~# and Disarm properties.
Mastery: You may add your Strength modifier to the ranged damage rolls of this weapon.When using sling staffs as a melee weapon, any entangle attack still deals its full damage.

Name: Wrist Shot
Mastery: Wrist shots deal 1d6 damage for you.When you roll 5 above the AC of a target, your enemy loses its reaction until the start of its next turn.If you have advantage and both dice would hit, all attacks against this enemy gain advantage until the end of your next turn.On a critical hit, these effects both apply.

Name: Yumi Bow
Mastery: Yumi bows lose the Loading property for you.When you score a critical hit, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your Weapon DC or be knocked prone.
